nodes.documentation:
@title ValidatorRegistry
@dev A contract for managing a registry of validators with comprehensive access control.
nodes.name: ValidatorRegistry

nodes.documentation:
@dev Adds a new validator to the registry with comprehensive validation.
@param _validator The address of the validator to be added.
nodes.name: addValidator

nodes.documentation:
@dev Removes a validator from the registry.
@param _validator The address of the validator to be removed.
nodes.name: removeValidator
setValidatorStatus
updateValidatorReputation
isValidator
getValidatorInfo

nodes.documentation:
@dev Gets the total number of active validators.
@return The number of active validators.
nodes.name: getActiveValidatorCount

devdoc.details: A contract for managing a registry of validators with comprehensive access control.

addValidator(address).details: Adds a new validator to the registry with comprehensive validation.

params._validator: The address of the validator to be added.

getActiveValidatorCount().details: Gets the total number of active validators.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Get the admin role that controls a role

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grant a role to an account

hasRole(bytes32,address).details: Check if an account has a specific role

isValidator(address).details: Checks if an address is an active validator.
isValidator(address).return: A boolean indicating whether the address is an active validator.

removeValidator(address).details: Removes a validator from the registry.

params._validator: The address of the validator to be removed.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Renounce a role (caller renounces their own role)

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revoke a role from an account

updateValidatorReputation(address,uint25.details: Updates validator reputation (can be called by market contract).

devdoc.title: ValidatorRegistry
